languages.text: "Помилуйте мою мелкую, трусливую душонку, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Я был обычным токарем, молился исправно, оружие лишь издали видал, избегать старался даже! Как бы я, да с лазружьем неисправным, да на Кошмаров попер?.. Должен был. Должен был, да не смог!" {n}Мужичок прикрывает глаза обмерзшими пальцами и приглушенно взвывает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Помилуйте мою мелкую, трусливую душонку, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Я был обычным токарем, молился исправно, оружие лишь издали видал, избегать старался даже! Как бы я, да с лазружьем неисправным, да на Кошмаров попер?.. Должен был. Должен был, да не смог!" {n}Мужичок прикрывает глаза обмерзшими пальцами и приглушенно взвывает.{/n}

languages.text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте мою мелкую, трусливую душонку, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес! Я был обычным токарем, молился исправно, оружие лишь издали видал, избегать старался даже! Как бы я, да с лазружьем неисправным, да на Кошмаров попер?.. Должен был. Должен был, да не смог!" {n}Мужичок прикрывает глаза обмерзшими пальцами и приглушенно взвывает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular turner, prayed every day, saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun?.. But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I could not!" {n}The man covers his eyes with frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

languages.text: 「この価値のない臆病な魂をお助けください、おお天の使節よ！私は普通の機工士で、毎日祈りを捧げ、武器には近づかず、それを避ける努力をしてきました！故障したラスガンで、どうやって悪魔たちに立ち向かえるのでしょうか？でも、私は立ち向かわなければならなかった。そう、立ち向かわなければならなかった、でもできなかった！」{n}男は凍傷を負った指で目を覆い、嘆き悲しんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この価値のない臆病な魂をお助けください、おお天の使節よ！私は普通の機工士で、毎日祈りを捧げ、武器には近づかず、それを避ける努力をしてきました！故障したラスガンで、どうやって悪魔たちに立ち向かえるのでしょうか？でも、私は立ち向かわなければならなかった。そう、立ち向かわなければならなかった、でもできなかった！」{n}男は凍傷を負った指で目を覆い、嘆き悲しんだ。{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous en prie, épargnez mon âme misérable, ô émissaire céleste ! J'étais un fidèle du Dieu-Machine comme les autres, je priais chaque jour et je ne m'étais jamais approché d'une arme ! Comment aurais-je pu affronter les cauchemars avec un fusil laser abîmé ? Pourtant, je n'avais pas le choix. Je n'avais pas le choix, mais je n'ai pas réussi à m'y résoudre ! » {n}L'homme cache son visage dans ses mains percluses d'engelures et laisse échapper un gémissement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en prie, épargnez mon âme misérable, ô émissaire céleste ! J'étais un fidèle du Dieu-Machine comme les autres, je priais chaque jour et je ne m'étais jamais approché d'une arme ! Comment aurais-je pu affronter les cauchemars avec un fusil laser abîmé ? Pourtant, je n'avais pas le choix. Je n'avais pas le choix, mais je n'ai pas réussi à m'y résoudre ! » {n}L'homme cache son visage dans ses mains percluses d'engelures et laisse échapper un gémissement.{/n}

languages.text: “请饶恕我这个一无是处的人吧，天国的使者。我只是个普通的机械师，每天都在祈祷。我从来不去碰武器，尽量离它们远点！我怎么可能用一把失灵的激光枪消灭那些梦魇啊？可我必须那么做。是啊，我本来就应该那么做，可我却做不到！”{n}男人用冻伤的手指捂住了眼睛，嚎啕大哭。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请饶恕我这个一无是处的人吧，天国的使者。我只是个普通的机械师，每天都在祈祷。我从来不去碰武器，尽量离它们远点！我怎么可能用一把失灵的激光枪消灭那些梦魇啊？可我必须那么做。是啊，我本来就应该那么做，可我却做不到！”{n}男人用冻伤的手指捂住了眼睛，嚎啕大哭。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Deje vivir a esta alma acobardada, {mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}! ¡Era maquinista practicante, rezaba todos los días, mantenía las distancias con las armas y procuraba evitarlas! ¿Cómo iba a enfrentarme a las pesadillas con un rifle láser defectuoso? Pero tenía que hacerlo. Sí, tenía que hacerlo, pero ¡no podía!». {n}El hombre se cubre los ojos con sus dedos congelados y gime.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Deje vivir a esta alma acobardada, {mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}! ¡Era maquinista practicante, rezaba todos los días, mantenía las distancias con las armas y procuraba evitarlas! ¿Cómo iba a enfrentarme a las pesadillas con un rifle láser defectuoso? Pero tenía que hacerlo. Sí, tenía que hacerlo, pero ¡no podía!». {n}El hombre se cubre los ojos con sus dedos congelados y gime.{/n}

languages.text: "Verschont meine wertlose, feige Seele, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}! Ich war ein regulärer Maschinist, ich habe jeden Tag gebetet, ich habe Waffen nur aus der Ferne gesehen und mein Bestes gegeben, um ihnen aus dem Weg zu gehen! Wie kann ich mit einem defekten Lasergewehr die Albträume abwehren? Aber ich musste es tun. Ja, ich musste es tun, doch ich konnte es nicht!" {n}Der Mann bedeckt seine Augen mit seinen erfrorenen Fingern und heult los.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verschont meine wertlose, feige Seele, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}! Ich war ein regulärer Maschinist, ich habe jeden Tag gebetet, ich habe Waffen nur aus der Ferne gesehen und mein Bestes gegeben, um ihnen aus dem Weg zu gehen! Wie kann ich mit einem defekten Lasergewehr die Albträume abwehren? Aber ich musste es tun. Ja, ich musste es tun, doch ich konnte es nicht!" {n}Der Mann bedeckt seine Augen mit seinen erfrorenen Fingern und heult los.{/n}

languages.text: "Beş para etmez, korkak ruhumu bağışla ey Kutsal Elçi! Sıradan bir makinisttim ben. Her gün dualarımı ettim, silahları sadece uzaktan görüp onlardan uzak olmak için elimden geleni yaptım! Elimde sadece bozuk bir silazer varken Kâbuslarla nasıl başa çıkabilirdim? Başa çıkmak zorunda kaldım işte. Zorunda kaldım ama başaramadım!" {n}Adam, soğuktan donmuş parmaklarıyla yüzünü kapatıp hüngür hüngür ağlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Spare my worthless cowardly soul, Heavenly Envoy! I was a regular machinist, I prayed every day, I saw weapons only from afar and tried my best to avoid them! How could I tackle the Nightmares with a malfunctioning lasgun? But I had to. Yes, I had to, but I couldn't!" {n}The man covers his eyes with his frostbitten fingers and wails.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beş para etmeyen korkak ruhumu bağışlayın Kutsal Elçi! Sıradan bir makinisttim ben.Her gün dualarımı ettim, silahları sadece uzaktan gördüm ve onlardan uzak durmak için elimden geleni yaptım! Elimde sadece bozuk bir lazer silahı varken Kâbuslarla nasıl başa çıkabilirdim? Başa çıkmak zorunda kaldım işte. Zorunda kaldım ama başarılı olamadım!" {n}Adam yüzünü soğuktan donmuş parmaklarıyla kapatıyor ve hüngür hüngür ağlamaya başlıyor.{/n}
